info.name: WCO Streams - Dark
info.description: A dark clean theme made for watchcartoononline.io. stretches the screen to remove most of the side pannels.
info.additionalInfo:
first edition on May 18 2019
2nd edit and revival - July 1 2019

Update - Cleanup (a lot) - Fixes - Some redesigns - September 1 2019
fixed - All pages not loading the theme correctly or partly
fixed - Anime info page now has a headerbar again
added - Better compatibility with -
 - - Anime list page
 - - Search - Search by genre - Search results
 - - Contacts
 - - Anime Video Page
 - - Base Watchcartoonsonline page
Less Curves - Reduced 10px to 4px curves (more sleek in my opinion)
and finally unified the color scheme (tried to get rid of pages / parts that were much brighter / darker than the rest of the page)
Hope you enjoy \o/

Update - October 21 2019
 - - Updated to the new domain

Update - November 8 2019
 - - Temp fix to video player not being on a seperate row than share , rating and watch on playlist button
 - - Fix for video player not being centered

Update - November 25 2019
 - - Proper Fix to video player not being centered and on a seperate row.
 - -Moved Share and Rating to below Remove Ad button

Update - November 25 2019
 - - I derped and didn't actually change anything. woops. All fixed

Update - November 27 2019
 - - Changed Name to fit the not so new URL

Update - December 6 2019
 - - Removed Ad under video player

Update - April 12 2020
 - - Fixed Nav bar stretching past the bar
